Pre-Game Insights: Copa America holders and reigning world champions Argentina will endeavour to maintain their perfect record in Group A
Peru are at risk of exiting the Copa America group stage for the first time since 1995
Argentina have already secured their spot in the quarter-finals of the 2024 Copa America
Peru have only accumulated one point from their opening two Group A fixtures
Peru's Paolo Guerrero needs one more strike to equal the late Teodoro Fernandez for the most goals scored by a Peruvian in the tournament's history
Argentina have not lost any of their previous 16 meetings with Peru
Peru have not beaten Argentina in any competition since 1997 Copa America
Peru must find their shooting boots on Saturday if they are to have any chance of claiming the victory
